name: SmartDoctor
0:
”Alexa, ask Smart Doctor for a tip”
”Alexa, ask Smart Doctor for a health tip”
”Alexa, open Smart Doctor and ask Smart Doctor for a health tip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart doctor
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart Doctor is a fact skill that gives different 'smart' health tips from its bank of tips each time it is invoked. For example you can say any of the following to get Smart Doctor to give you a new tip:
Alexa, ask Smart Doctor for a tip
Alexa, ask Smart Doctor for a health tip
Alexa, ask Smart Doctor to tell me a tip
Alexa, ask Smart Doctor to tell me a health tip
Alexa, ask Smart Doctor to give me a tip
Alexa, ask Smart Doctor to give me a health tip

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
